document_data.name: The Dragon's Bower
document_data.mainbody: '''The Dragon's Bower''' was an inn that stood along a road east of the city of [[Shamph]] in [[Chondath]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: As of the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century DR, The Dragon's Bower's innkeep was [[Tchond Tchar]]. Tchond worked closely with the undercover [[Harper agent]] [[Eldorn]] who infiltrated the Chondathan cell of the [[Cult of Tiamat]]. Those allies who needed to contact Eldorn had to leave a coded message with Tchond Tchar at The Dragon's Bower, according to [[Elminster Aumar]].
